transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Jain Optic Equipment Company se baat kar rahe hain Mr. Shreyansh Bothara.
Executive: Nahi main unke brother baat kar raha hun Pratik Bothara. Ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Haan sir main IndiaMART se baat kar raha tha Noida head office se Satyajit Tiwari.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Sir IndiaMART ki service agar kaun dekhta hai aap dekhte hain ya brother dekhte hain?
Executive: Mere brother dekhte hain par main customer receive mein bhi kabhi kabhi karta hun.
Customer: Nahi nahi service ke regarding wohi feedback denge.
Executive: Wohi wohi denge haan ji.
Customer: Okay okay. Woh abhi thoda busy hai bahar.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai main unko connect karunga theek hai. Dhanyavad.
Customer: Kab aa jayenge sir woh bahar se?
Executive: Matlab abhi kal kal ya kal na bole kal dijiyega. Sham nahi sham ko bhi nahi honge. Parso kar lijiyega Sunday.
Customer: Matlab Monday.
Executive: Monday to off rahega.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai theek hai theek hai sir Monday ko theek theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to connect with Shreyansh Bothara.

Resolution:

- Customer informed Shreyansh is currently unavailable.

- Agreed to connect on Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, unavailability, call schedule
